name: Heart Chain Kitty: All Screwed Up
storyline: When a delivery goes wrong, Kitty Island ends up being covered in gigantic screws. However, they're not at all like normal run-of-the-mill hardware store screws. Quite far from it! Kittey is tasked with clearing the island of this potential danger. A new adventure begins.
summary:
Heart Chain Kitty: All Screwed Up is a 2d platformer with 3d graphics featuring Kittey, the perpetually tired cat. After a delivery goes wrong, Kittey's island is covered in big screws, kicking off a new adventure.

The game is a continuation of the freeware "A Game with a Kitty" game series.
